chanda wimasima paswaru 4 dakwa kriyathmaka wanu atha.chanda madhyasthana 11,098 kadi chandaya prakasha kirima siduwana bawa mathiwarana mahalekam karyalaya sandahan kaleya.mewara parlimenthu mathiwaranaya sandaha chandaya prakasha kirimata sudusukam laba athi chanda dayakayinge sankhyawa 14,088,500ki.kolambaa, gampaha, kurunagala yana disthrikkawalin wadima chanda dayakayin sankhyawak liyapadinchi wi athi bawa mathiwarana mahalekam karyalaya prakasha kaleya.kolambaa disthrikkayen mewara chandaya prakasha kirimata sudusukam laba athi chandadayakayinge sankhyawa 1,521,854 k.gampaha disthrikkayen 1,474,484 denek chandaya prakasha kirimata sudusukam laba athi athara kurunagala disthrikkayen chandaya prakasha kirimata sudusukam laba athi chandadayakayinge sankhyawa  1,183,649 k we.awathan wu kandawuruwala sitina pudgalayin 45,692 denek chandaya prakasha kirimata sudusukam laba thibe.wanni disthrikkaye awathan wu kandawuruwala sitina chandadayakayin 15,817 denek saha puththalama disthrikkaye awathan wu kandawuruwala sitina chandadayakayin 26,582 denek chandaya prakasha kirimata niyamithaya.

bi්rathanyaye palawana “da san” puwathpathe web adawi oopadupa thiruwakin “madonage wiwahaya nulakin elli thibe” yanuwen puwathak wartha kara thibima da ewannaki.madona siya gi albamayaka pa්racharaka katayuthuª wenuwen amarikawe kalaya gathakirimath, ee atharathura siya sinama adhyakshana katayuthu wenuwen rich engalanthaye kalaya gathakirimath me katakathawalata hethuwannata atha’yi madonage pa්rakashikawa wana lis rosenbarg pawasanniya.dedena depasata wi unne wruththiyamaya katayuthu sandaha wina wiwahaye gataluwak nisa nowe ya’yi aa pawasanniya. 39 hawiridi rich ha 49 hawiridi madona yuwalata sathhawiridi “roko” namin puthaku da we.

anith sampradhayika kramaya thamayi shukra tharalaya pita wimata pera shishnaya yoni margayen pitathata ganima.mekath harima asarthaka kramayak.mokada suranthayedi shukra tharalaya pita unata aththatama eeta kalin indalama tika tika shukra tharalaya muda harenawa.anika hondama shukranu tika pawathinneth me mulinma pita wena shukra tharalaye.ee nisa upath palana kramayak widihata asarthakayi wagema me kramaya niyama lingika thrupthiyak labaganna ekatath badha karanda puluwan.ayi ithin patan gaththu welawe indan oluwe wada karanne paththu wenda kalin thuwakkuwa eliyata ganna eka ganane.
